PLAHIS Planning Application Reference: DM2025/00092--- Address: 20 Wood StreetMitcham JunctionCR4 4JS--- Proposal: Erection of a part one, part two storey rear extension and alterations to fenestrations.--- Status: GTD--- Decision: GTD--- Date Decision Issued: 26-MAR-25---
ASLC Area of Special Local Character: ASLC02 DD

decision_conditions: Prior to installation, details of the insulation render to be used on the exterior of the building(s) shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The approved materials shall be used in the construction of the development hereby approved, completed prior to its occupation/use and retained thereafter.Reason: To safeguard the visual amenities of the area and to ensure compliance with Policies 28 and 30 of the Sutton Local Plan 2018. This condition is required to ensure that materials are considered at a early stageof the construction process and it is important that details are agreed at this stage as this could potentially impact on construction method.
description: Application to clear condition 3 (external insulation render materials details) of approved application DM2025/00092.
